definition: to enjoy/to live it up/pleasure/CL:種|种[zhong3]
to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Look for more to come and enjoy today's feature.
sentences.chinese: 敬请期待后续报道，享受今天的内容。

sentences.english: I want players to enjoy the 'aha!' of solving a puzzle.
sentences.chinese: 我希望玩家能享受解决一个谜题后“啊哈”的感觉。

sentences.english: Then when you get older and think back, you’ll be able to enjoy it a second time.
sentences.chinese: 当你年老回首往事时，便能再次享受你的一生。

sentences.english: Allow plenty of time for this deceptively short journey.
sentences.chinese: 有大把时间享受这一短暂的迷幻之路。

sentences.english: Mrs. Chambers sits comfortably in her  armchair, enjoying a cup of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 乔柏斯太太舒服地坐在扶手椅里，享受着一杯咖啡。

sentences.english: I refused my heart no pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 凡我心里所念的，我都会让自己享受。

sentences.english: Your watch will be repaired free if it is still under guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 你的手表在保修期内可享受免费修理。

sentences.english: High-speed thrills are one of the chief attractions of skiing on grass.
sentences.chinese: 享受高速滑行的快感，是滑草主要的乐趣之一。

sentences.english: They enjoy cof. fee more. They know more about the history of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲人和美国人不大一样，他们更享受咖啡。

sentences.english: Is the artist at the national level, enjoy State Council special benefit.
sentences.chinese: 系国家一级美术师，享受国务院特殊津贴。

sentences.english: So where can you go to indulge in a little aqua love?
sentences.chinese: 那么在些什么地方能享受这水中之欢呢？

sentences.english: Real Madrid defender Gabriel Heinze has conceded he would be interested in playing Premier League football again.
sentences.chinese: 皇马后卫海因策已经承认他可以再次享受英超足球。

sentences.english: His daughter, too, spoke with pride at how much he had enjoyed work as well as family life.
sentences.chinese: 他女儿也孤高地谈到他是何等地享受事情与家庭糊口。

sentences.english: We have to go out and eat the gourmet food to enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 要享受美味大餐，就得出去吃。

sentences.english: Taurus will show Capricorn how to enjoy a well-deserved break every so often and how to appreciate beauty and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 牛向魔证实要经常享受生活的片刻，享受美和舒适。

sentences.english: Taurus will show Capricorn how to enjoy a well-deserved break every so often and how to appreciate beauty and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 牛向魔证实要经常享受生活的片刻，享受美和舒适。

definition: to enjoy/to benefit/to have the use of
to sense/perception/to feel (through the senses)/to experience/a feeling/an impression/an experience
at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
to taste a small amount/to sample
to give to/to provide to/to bring to/to take to
